keyMappings:
unmap t
unmap n
unmap N
unmap <c-n>
unmap B
unmap l
unmap <c-r>

map o Vomnibar.activateInNewTab
map O Vomnibar.activate
map b Vomnibar.activateBookmarksInNewTab
map B Vomnibar.activateBookmarks
map <c-p> Vomnibar.activateTabSelection
map l goBack
map h goForward
map u scrollUp
map e scrollDown
map U scrollUp count=4 #scrollFullPageUp
map E scrollDown count=4 #FullPageDown
map n scrollLeft
map i scrollRight
map Q removeTab
map ti nextTab
map tn previousTab
map tu createTab
map te moveTabToNewWindow
map tmn moveTabLeft
map tmi moveTabRight
map = performFind
map - performBackwardsFind
map k focusInput
# map k enterInsertMode
map v enterVisualMode
map V enterVisualLineMode
searchEngines:
w: https://www.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s Wikipedia

# More examples.
#
# (Vimium supports search completion Wikipedia, as
# above, and for these.)
#
# g: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google
# l: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s&btnI I'm feeling lucky...
# y: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube
# gm: https://www.google.com/maps?q=%s Google maps
# b: https://www.bing.com/search?q=%s Bing
# d: https://duckduckgo.com/?q=%s DuckDuckGo
# az: https://www.amazon.com/s/?field-keywords=%s Amazon
# qw: https://www.qwant.com/?q=%s Qwant
